title: Gemstones
body:
Can you get them from Championship chests? 
I know you get jewels, can anyone confirm if they've got a gemstone in a Championship chest.

replies.body: Championship chests are similar to hextech chests, the only difference being the addition of jewels.  It's just a matter of luck!  Maybe fortune be in your favor! :D

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=fenNO1yn,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-05T15:44:04.052+0000)
>
> Championship chests are similar to hextech chests, the only difference being the addition of jewels.  It's just a matter of luck!  Maybe fortune be in your favor! :D

Yes, I opened a chest yesterday in fact and recieved a gemstone.
